accessibilityHints.title: Accessibility tips for writing feedback
accessibilityHints.description: These pages are structured so you can review scores with a keyboard or screen reader.

headings.title: Navigate by headings
headings.body: Task summaries and supporting sections use logical heading levels. Use your screen reader shortcuts to jump between Task 1, Task 2, and supporting insights.

bandBreakdown.title: Band breakdowns
bandBreakdown.body: Criterion scores are presented as definition lists so assistive tech announces the criterion before the band and feedback snippet.

textAlternatives.title: Text alternatives
textAlternatives.body: Charts and highlights are followed by text-based summaries so information remains available if visual elements are hard to perceive.

accessibilityHints.footer: If you notice an accessibility issue, email support@gramorx.com and the team will help.

brand.description: The most advanced IELTS preparation platform powered by AI and expert teaching.
